features: SIMPLE STORAGE: Living spaces stay clean and clutter-free with this bookshelf storage furniture unit; Open 4-tier design lets you easily see what you have stored; Organize and display books, collectibles, figurines, souvenirs, succulents, plants, flowers, pictures, personal memories, and more; Use it to hold fresheners, candles, canisters, pots, planters, and other accessories; Use this shelf on its own or combine multiples to create a larger storage system

INSTANT ORGANIZATION: The modern, industrial-inspired design of this shelving furniture unit adds some style to your storage and complements your decor; Beautiful and functional, this shelving unit provides a convenient storage option in any room of the home; This is the perfect decorative wall accent for displaying photos, storing books and magazines, or arranging plants and other knick-knacks

FUNCTIONAL & VERSATILE: Create extra storage space wherever you need it; Take advantage of unused rooms or a blank wall in your home; This shelving unit is versatile to use in kitchens for holding cook or bakeware and cookbooks; Great in the laundry or utility room for sorting detergents and cleaning supplies; This convenient shelf is also great for garages, offices and more; Ideal for optimizing space in homes, apartments, condos, college dorm rooms, and cabins

QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Made from a strong steel frame with a durable finish; MDF wood shelving; Stable feet; Assembles in minutes - easy to follow instructions and all hardware are included; Easy care - Clean with a damp cloth
THOUGHTFULLY SIZED: Measures 10.87" x 23.62" x 45.67" high; Space between each shelf measures 12" high

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Add Decorative Storage and Organization to Your Home Furniture is an easy way to incorporate a personal statement to any room in your home while optimizing storage. Bedrooms, hallways, the living room, or the home office are great spaces to showcase shelves, dressers, tables, seating, desks, and accents. Style your room and store clothing, memories, and trinkets with mDesign.

Industrial Stackable Nesting End Tables for Photos, Books, and Magazines This set of accent tables vary in height and can be used to display treasured items in a living room, guest room, or bedroom. These versatile end tables can stack on top of one another to save space next to a couch or chair or they can be separated and used on their own for work and leisure. Entertain guests and put out drinks and snacks for a gathering or rest notebooks, files, and a computer during the workday.

Fashionable Seating, Storage, and Decor for Any Bedroom, Living Room, Entryway, or Home Office Cushioned Round Ottoman with Studs Provides Extra Seating and Modern Style The chic look of this stool provides a cozy place to sit and adds elegance to your décor. It’s padded, round cushion creates a soft surface to relax while the studs give it an edgy accent. This piece looks great in front of a favorite chair, tucked under a vanity or makeup table, or can be used as a footrest near a couch or loveseat. Narrow Tall Furniture Storage Cabinet Unit with 4 Removable Fabric Drawers Organize small items and accessories with this slim 4-tier dresser. Versatile for bedrooms, offices, living rooms, and closets, this cabinet keeps clutter under control. Easy-pull handles make opening and closing drawers simple. Fabric drawers have a reinforced base and are removable. Modern Metal Accent Side Table with Bottom Shelf and Water-Resistant Top for Entryway Style your foyer and welcome friends and family with this minimal industrial accent table. The sturdy design is great for compact spaces and boasts a personal touch to your décor. Display photos, books, vases, plants, and other personal effects on this beautiful inlay table or its matching bottom shelf. Small Nightstand End Table with 2 Removable Fabric Drawers for Bedroom Store small items, extra blankets, or off-season clothes and linens in this compact storage unit. Perfect as a nightstand next to the bed or as an end table by the couch or a chair in the living room. This metal dresser has 2 removable fabric drawers with a reinforced base.

Baby + Kid Dresser Storage Unit with Removable Fabric Drawers for Nursery or Playroom Keep clutter under control with storage dressers for kids and babies. Easily hold toys, games, books, hats, socks, onesies, diapers, blankets, pacifiers, burping cloths, wipes, and other essentials. These furniture units feature removable fabric drawers with a reinforced base and are ideal for small spaces in little ones’ bedrooms or playrooms.

mDesign - Solutions for Home. Solutions for Life. Whether you’re organizing your bathroom, living room, bedroom, office, playroom, or laundry room, mDesign has you covered. Our wide variety of products are stylish, purposeful, and affordable. De-clutter your home with confidence when you shop with mDesign.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Once you put it together, there’s no taking it apart, even if you make a mistake in assembly
reviews.reviewText: These sort of shelves are usually easy to piece together but not this one!! This shelving will need a lot of strength to assemble the parts together, especially the side frames. 2 separate side pieces should connect together smoothly to create one long side piece but it doesn’t connect together smoothly. I felt like I was trying to shove a square peg into a slightly smaller square hole. As someone else suggested, use a rubber mallet if you have one. I didn’t have one so I really had to use brute force to shove the pieces together. Once connected, it will be difficult to pull them apart should I ever need to disassemble.The plastic “feet” also needed to be hammered in. While hammering it, a piece of plastic broke off and hit my face. Didn’t realize I would need a helmet or face shield to put shelving together.One of the screws into a shelf also doesn’t tighten, it just spins.The instructions won’t give you a warning to make sure the holes to screw in the X-brace should both be in the rear and I was lucky enough to have done this correctly because there is no way I would be able to separate the 2 side pieces apart again if I had made that mistake. This type of furniture is typically disposable and not for long term use but I still regret the purchase. Not worth it even with the Black Friday discount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and compact little shelf
reviews.reviewText: Good for an affordable small space shelf that is stylish and practical. I got the smaller one, see photo- it is a shorter shelf. Versatile, I could rearrange and use this as an open cupboard in the kitchen, a decorative bookshelf, or even a shoe/boot shelf. Would be great in a smaller home, apartment, or dorm.Look: white metal with light birch oak (?) wood is a pleasing combo. I like that it’s not slanted, as many of the “ladder” style shelves similar to this have tapered shelves.Assembly: okay. Not a lot to put together, so very few steps, fairly straightforward instructions. Could have had helpful hints. For example, I accidentally flipped the front on one of the sides, not realizing until later that the support beams in the back needed the holes to screw in. I just left it - you can see in the pic front right.I did have a problem sliding Part A into B for the metal sides. Mine got stuck and wasn’t a perfect fit - but I used a rubber mallet to make it go in. Be careful, if your putting together solo, I caught some skin in when sliding together and got a little blister. Don’t hurt yourself shoving them in! Use a tool!Overall it’s a good shelf for the price, if you’re looking for a simple nice looking shelf. Will probably keep it for a while and it will have many purposes over time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I guess you get what you pay for but the shelves look cheap. The metal easily bends. And the unit is flimsy. The shelf screws are silver and exposed on the outside. Stuck with them so I will use them - but will definitely replace with something more sturdy and substantial looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Let’s start with the fact that two selves didn’t have holes on the ends and we had to find them, then the top shelf already broke on the ends where the screws go. Not impressed considering we just put it together! We moved selves around and put the broken shelf on the bottom but I can see where the particular board is just shattered.

reviews.reviewTitle: The bookshelf is great! I bought 2 of these and enjoying them
reviews.reviewText: The bookshelf is great! I bought 2 of these and enjoying them.
I use it in my bathroom because I do not have a place to put my towels.
